title: Stop Bothering Me, Emperor - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Ancient China   Clingy Lover   College/University   Couple Growth   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Family   Fated Lovers   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kidnappings   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Loyal Subordinates   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Older Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Racism   Reincarnation   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Showbiz   Smart Couple   Time Skip   Wealthy Characters
author: Lu Ye Qian He   绿野千鹤
description:
When Song Xiao was young, he wanted to become a Virtuous Official for a lifetime, but was forced to marry into the palace by that uncooperative Emperor; when his Virtuous Empress For A Lifetime career had just started, the Emperor died……

Opening his eyes again, he’d come to the twenty-first century. The once highly-talented and literary Scholar Lang also has to carry his book bag and face the college entrance examinations. Just that, this desk-mate looks a little familiar……

His Majesty the Emperor: ▼＿▼ Lend me your homework to copy

Song Xiao: ……>
